amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to procure any Army Aircrew Combat Uniforms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to procure any Army Aircrew Combat Uniforms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Gosar.
